Nick Hagar

Researching collective attention, generative AI, and computational journalism. more about me

Postdoctoral Scholar, Generative AI in the Newsroom Initiative at Northwestern University
Incoming Assistant Professor, Hubbard School of Journalism and Mass Communication at the University of Minnesota

substack

Tools & prototypes

  • Substack API

    Unofficial wrapper for Substack APIs to fetch newsletters, posts, and more.

  • Common Crawl Genealogy

    Data collection code for 50+ LLM training datasets.

  • Archive Check

    CLI for collecting website data from the Internet Archive, GDELT, and more.

  • Liquify

    Cross-provider LLM memory management tool.

  • LLM data schema generator

    An early attempt to automatically generate schema for structured outputs with LLMs.
